sql: SELECT MIN(mi.info) AS movie_budget, MIN(mi_idx.info) AS movie_votes, MIN(t.title) AS movie_title FROM cast_info AS ci, info_type AS it1, info_type AS it2, movie_info AS mi, movie_info_idx AS mi_idx, name AS n, title AS t WHERE ci.note  in ('(producer)', '(executive producer)') AND it1.info  = 'budget' AND it2.info  = 'votes' AND n.gender  = 'm' and n.name like '%Tim%' AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND n.id = ci.person_id AND it1.id = mi.info_type_id AND it2.id = mi_idx.info_type_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(it1 t mi_idx it2 mi ci n)
 HashJoin(it1 t mi_idx it2 mi ci)
 HashJoin(it1 t mi_idx it2 mi)
 MergeJoin(t mi_idx it2 mi)
 HashJoin(mi_idx it2 mi)
 HashJoin(mi_idx it2)
 IndexScan(it1)
 IndexScan(t)
 SeqScan(mi_idx)
 SeqScan(it2)
 BitmapScan(mi)
 BitmapScan(ci)
 BitmapScan(n)
 Leading((((it1 (t ((mi_idx it2) mi))) ci) n)) */
